about.title: About Jane
about.subtitle: Independent designer helping small businesses succeed
about.content: With 8+ years of experience in web design and branding, I specialize in creating beautiful, conversion-focused websites for small businesses. My approach combines strategic thinking with creative design to deliver results that matter.

items.text: Jane transformed our website and our business! Conversions are up 40% and we finally have a site we're proud to share.
